articles.description: Fans are rallying around this Wheel of Fortune contestant after it sounded like she correctly guessed a $100,000 puzzle.
articles.content:
A college student just lost out on $100,000 during Wednesday’s (April 6) episode of Wheel of Fortune and fans are upset.
Texas Women’s University student Alexa Hoekstra was competing on the show’s C… [+1841 chars]

articles.author: Laura Parkin
articles.title: Pharrell Williams fans can't believe his age as he celebrates milestone birthday - Daily Mail
articles.description: Twitter users marvelled at his ageless looks as they urged him to 'drop his skincare routine' and 'share his secrets.'
articles.content:
Fans of Pharrell Williams couldn't believe the singer's real age this week as he celebrated a milestone birthday.
